channel.title: EUNIS Database v2
channel.description: EUNIS Database v2 is the next version of EUNIS Database (the current version is available at http://eunis.eea.eu.int). EUNIS Database v2 is currently under development.

item.title: Version 2.0 Release Control 1 was released
item.description: Version 2.0 Release Control 1 was released
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Accessibility support
item.description: Accessibility support has been implemented into EUNIS Database
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: XHTML 1.0 and HTML 4 support
item.description: XHTML 1.0 and HTML 4 support has been implemented into EUNIS Database
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: New PDF factsheets and new TSV downloads
item.description: New PDF factsheets and new TSV downloads have been developed
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: Tutorials have beed added to EUNIS Database to support better user experience
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: GIS Tool
item.description: A new version of the GIS Tool was released
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Changes in software
item.description: Many changes were made to web site interface, site code, project organization
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: The MySQL database was updated
item.description: The MySQL database was updated; New designation types support was implemented for sites
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Advanced and combined search
item.description: Revisions were made to advanced and combined search
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Statistical data for Species was updated
item.description: Statistical data for Species was updated
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: All the searches implemented in EUNIS Database were revisited and updated
item.description: All the searches implemented in EUNIS Database were revisited and updated
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Multilanguage support
item.description: Multilanguage support will be completed during September - currently under development
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Interface update
item.description: Changes were made to the user interface: Main page, tabs in factsheets etc.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Search results
item.description: The results columns were changed in the Species module; Under development.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Taxonomy
item.description: New species taxonomy classification implemented
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Statistics
item.description: More statistics added for Species module
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Species factsheet changed
item.description: Species factsheet changed: tabs, links, appearance
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Database update
item.description: Database update - approx. 300.000 species
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Security update
item.description: Security update for Apache server - directory listing
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Bug fixes
item.description: Many changes were made to all the modules to correct and improve functionality as result of two weeks testing
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Fuzzy search update
item.description: Fuzzy search update
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Interface update
item.description: More improvements were made to the user interface; Fonts, styles again, pictures, maps, logos etc.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Inline content management editor
item.description: The content management system was redesigned
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Pick/Show easy searches update
item.description: The Pick/Show easy searches result pages were changed; No more popups and columns update
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: List of values
item.description: The list of values windows were updated; Changes also in specific advanced/combined searches
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Services, Glossary, Bookmarks, Login, References, Feedback updates
item.description: The Glossary, Bookmarks, Login, References, Feedback functions were updated; bugs were fixed
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Automatic DiGIR check
item.description: The DiGIR menu changes color according to status of DiGIR Provider
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Habitat types updates
item.description: Changes were made to the habit types module, including the database
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Species and Sites modules updated
item.description: Changes were made to the species and sites modules: maps, lookups, etc.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: New headline function
item.description: New headline inline editing function was added
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: GIS Tool update
item.description: New update of the GIS Tool
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Show map function update
item.description: Update of the Show Map functionality
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Fuzzy search update
item.description: Fuzzy search searches also in vernacular name
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Interface update
item.description: Improvements were made to the user interface; EC CHM portal compatibility look and feel
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Habitat types lookup tables
item.description: The database was updated with habitat types lookup tables
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: References
item.description: Changes made to improve functionality
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Popups removed
item.description: Popup windows were removed from the web interface whenever appropiate for better usability
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Fuzzy search support
item.description: Quick search by name has support for fuzzy search
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Other updates
item.description: Updates were made to: users administration, habitat types module, factsheets
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Tabs interface for nature object pages updated
item.description: Tabs interface update for nature object factsheet pages
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Search in vernacular names
item.description: Quich search by names searches also in vernacular names
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: New columns in advanced and combined search
item.description: New columns were added to the results pages for advanced and combined queries
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Columns removed from results
item.description: The 'Other info' columns were removed from results pages
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: New GIS Tool
item.description: The first version of the new GIS Tool is online
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: New Bookmark function
item.description: A new functionality for saving user bookmarks was added
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Main page updated
item.description: The main page design was updated
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: General updates
item.description: General updates were made: searches, users, services
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Tabs interface for nature object pages
item.description: Tabs interface rebuild for nature object pages
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Tabs interface for nature object factsheets
item.description: Tabs interface rebuild for nature object factsheet
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: EUNIS Online Collaboration Tool
item.description: EUNIS Online Collaboration Tool is online
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: DiGIR Provider updated
item.description: New DiGIR data is online - more than 800.000 entries are public
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Quick search by name
item.description: New Quick search by name functionality addded into EUNIS
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Natura 2000 sites factsheet updated
item.description: The Natura 2000 sites factsheet were updated
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Multilanguage support
item.description: All static text from EUNIS Database pages was moved into CMS (Content Management System) in order to enable online web site updates and multilanguage support
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: GBIF link
item.description: GBIF link from species factsheet was added
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: EUNIS Database Tool update
item.description: The EUNIS Database tool was updated to support dynamic runtime table names, support for new dictionaries etc.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: EUNIS Meeting
item.description: EUNIS Database meeting in Copenhagen scheduled for 15 and 16 March 2005
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Habitats factsheet update
item.description: Habitats factsheet page updated: tooltips, attributes etc.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Web site update
item.description: Web site update: style, look and feel, news page etc.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: EUNIS Database logos
item.description: New EUNIS Database logos available for anyone who likes to link to EUNIS Database
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: EUNIS Database logos
item.description: New EUNIS Database logos available for anyone who likes to link to EUNIS Database
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: GIS Tool
item.description: A very early preview of the new GIS Tool, developed in Macromedia Flash, is available
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Indicators easy searches development started
item.description: Two new prototype easy searches regarding indicators were added for Species and Habitat Types. This work is under development.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Accesibility stylesheet
item.description: A new high contrast stylesheet (Black/White) is available for all users following the accessibility target
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Database update
item.description: 10 new tables containing dictionary lookup codes were added to the EUNIS Database database. The database was updated.
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: Visitors counter
item.description: A visitors counter was added to EUNIS Database web application
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency

item.title: News page
item.description: News page added to EUNIS Database and also RSS syndication was added, accessible from the main page
item.dc:creator: EEA - European Environment Agency
